name: portfolio-website
description: Personal portfolio website with Angular frontend and Flask backend

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python app.py
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && ruff check .
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
scripts.lint:fix:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && ruff check --fix .
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:frontend && npm run format:check:backend
